channel.title: [508] How Do i add ::unban command[508]
channel.description:
Sometimes I accidently ban ppl and Im using Rule-12 source I try and edit the "bannedusers" document and I delete the name and It says "bannedusers.dat is in use by another application and cannot be accessed I really Need help
Also I want to disable ::lvl so people cant stathack is there a way I can disable the stat hacking without removing ::lvl Does ::setlevel work for a 508? And how do I edit it Plz put some directions
Thankz!

item.title: [508] How Do i add ::unban command[508]
item.dc:creator: @m4ul_tw1nz m4ul tw1nz
item.description:
@m4ul_tw1nz wrote:

u need shutdown ur server when u save ur “banneduserlist” and restart ~! i know it stupid! ~@!

Read full topic
